pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quantile Regression in Varying-Coefficient Models // Quantile regression in varying-coefficient models (VCM) using one particular nonparametric technique called P-splines. The functions can be applied on three types of VCM; (1) Homoscedastic VCM, (2) Simple heteroscedastic VCM, and (3) General heteroscedastic VCM.
